#summary Functions in jOWL.


{{{
jOWL.load(path, callback, options);
}}}
Initializes jOWL with OWL-RDFS document - xml file.
  * path : (mandatory) relative path to xml document
  * callback : function to be called when loading completes.
  * options : (optional) JSONObject:
    * onParseError : function(msg){} function to be called when parsing fails
    * reason : true/false, turns on additional reasoning at the expense of performance
    * locale: set preferred language (if available), examples en, fr...
----
{{{
jOWL.parse(document, options);
}}}
Initializes jOWL with an OWL-RDFS document - xml document object.
  * document: (mandatory) xml document object
  * options: see jOWL.load
----
{{{
jOWL.toString(xmlNode);
}}}
Returns a String representation of the OWL-RDFS document
  * xmlNode : (optional) if specified, only serializes that part of the DOM to String
